title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Suns owner getting suspended and fined. What's the upside to keeping him there? Lions DE Aidan Hutchinson calls in to discuss his Billie Jean rendition on Hard Knocks. And Celtics guard Marcus Smart tells us he reaction to being involved in trade rumors this offseason.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
